author: Keach Hagey
title: Sumner Redstone Wouldn’t Have Last Word on a CBS-Viacom Merger
text:
Sumner Redstone has overwhelming voting control of CBS Corp. and Viacom Inc. And yet, he won’t have the final say over whether the companies merge.
That is because the 94-year-old media mogul, whose health has declined so significantly that he cannot speak much beyond grunts, has only one vote on the board of National Amusements Inc., the holding company he controls that in turn owns most of the voting stakes in CBS and Viacom.
